oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pescarol, Moshe ben Avraham
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bible. O.T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illuminated scroll, earliest known example of an Italian illustrated Magillah. This section shows three panels, the first depicts a man in a blue coat in the centre, with two men standing on his right and three men kneeling on his left. The second panel shows two men sat at desk, one in blue, one in white. A third man also dressed in blue stands pointing to the two seated men. The third shows three standing men with moustaches, opening their coats.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail of Esther scroll
